name: Medieval Mystery Match
description: Enjoy this medieval themed fantasy match 3 game. Play in a variety of environments and travel this fantasy world as you match your way through 100 levels. Earn gold along the way that can earn you bonuses and extra special symbols to help you progress through the harder levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
